verses.verse: O foolish <WG453> Galatians, <WG1052> who <WG5101> has bewitched <WG940> you, that you should not obey <WG3982> the truth, <WG225> before <WG2596> whose <WG3739> eyes <WG3788> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> has been evidently <WG4270> set <WG4270> forth, <WG4270> crucified <WG4717> among <WG1722> you?

This <WG5124> only <WG3440> would <WG2309> I learn <WG3129> of you, Received <WG2983> you the Spirit <WG4151> by the works <WG2041> of the law, <WG3551> or <WG2228> by the hearing <WG189> of faith? <WG4102>
Are you so <WG3779> foolish? <WG453> having begun <WG1728> in the Spirit, <WG4151> are you now <WG3568> made <WG2005> perfect <WG2005> by the flesh? <WG4561>
Have <WG2192> you suffered <WG3958> so <WG5118> many <WG5118> things in vain? <WG1500> if <WG1489> it be yet <WG2596> in vain. <WG1500>

He therefore <WG3767> that ministers <WG2023> to you the Spirit, <WG4151> and works <WG1754> miracles <WG1411> among <WG1722> you, does he it by the works <WG2041> of the law, <WG3551> or <WG2228> by the hearing <WG189> of faith? <WG4102>
Even <WG2531> as Abraham <WG11> believed <WG4100> God, <WG2316> and it was accounted <WG3049> to him for righteousness. <WG1343>
Know <WG1097> you therefore <WG686> that they which are of faith, <WG4102> the same <WG3778> are the children <WG5207> of Abraham. <WG11>

And the scripture, <WG1124> foreseeing <WG4275> that God <WG2316> would justify <WG1344> the heathen <WG1484> through <WG1537> faith, <WG4102> preached <WG4283> before <WG4283> the gospel <WG4283> to Abraham, <WG11> saying, In you shall all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> be blessed. <WG1757>
So <WG5620> then they which be of faith <WG4102> are blessed <WG2127> with faithful <WG4103> Abraham. <WG11>

For as many <WG3745> as are of the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551> are under <WG5259> the curse: <WG2671> for it is written, <WG1125> Cursed <WG1944> is every <WG3956> one that continues <WG1696> not in all <WG3956> things which <WG3588> are written <WG1125> in the book <WG975> of the law <WG3551> to do <WG4160> them.

But that no <WG3762> man <WG3762> is justified <WG1344> by the law <WG3551> in the sight <WG3844> of God, <WG2316> it is evident: <WG1212> for, The just <WG1342> shall live <WG2198> by faith. <WG4102>
And the law <WG3551> is not of faith: <WG4102> but, The man <WG444> that does <WG4160> them shall live <WG2198> in them.

Christ <WG5547> has redeemed <WG1805> us from the curse <WG2671> of the law, <WG3551> being made <WG1096> a curse <WG2671> for us: for it is written, <WG1125> Cursed <WG1944> is every <WG3956> one that hangs <WG2910> on <WG1909> a tree: <WG3586>

That the blessing <WG2129> of Abraham <WG11> might come <WG1096> on <WG1519> the Gentiles <WG1484> through <WG1722> Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547> that we might receive <WG2983> the promise <WG1860> of the Spirit <WG4151> through <WG1223> faith. <WG4102>

Brothers, <WG80> I speak <WG3004> after <WG2596> the manner of men; <WG444> Though <WG3676> it be but a man's <WG444> covenant, <WG1242> yet if it be confirmed, <WG2964> no <WG3762> man <WG3762> cancels, <WG114> or <WG2228> adds <WG1928> thereto. <WG1928>

Now <WG1161> to Abraham <WG11> and his seed <WG4690> were the promises <WG1860> made. <WG4483> He said <WG3004> not, And to seeds, <WG4690> as of many; <WG4183> but as of one, <WG1520> And to your seed, <WG4690> which <WG3739> is Christ. <WG5547>

And this <WG5124> I say, <WG3004> that the covenant, <WG1242> that was confirmed <WG4300> before <WG4300> of God <WG2316> in Christ, <WG5547> the law, <WG3551> which was four <WG5071> hundred <WG5071> and thirty <WG5144> years <WG2094> after, <WG3326> cannot <WG3756> cancel, <WG208> that it should make <WG2673> the promise <WG1860> of none <WG208> effect. <WG2673>
For if <WG1487> the inheritance <WG2817> be of the law, <WG3551> it is no <WG3765> more <WG2089> of promise: <WG1860> but God <WG2316> gave <WG5483> it to Abraham <WG11> by promise. <WG1860>

Why <WG5101> then <WG3767> serves the law? <WG3551> It was added <WG4369> because <WG5484> of transgressions, <WG3847> till <WG891> <WG3757> the seed <WG4690> should come <WG2064> to whom <WG3739> the promise <WG1861> was made; <WG1861> and it was ordained <WG1299> by angels <WG32> in the hand <WG5495> of a mediator. <WG3316>
Now <WG1161> a mediator <WG3316> is not a mediator of one, <WG1520> but God <WG2316> is one. <WG1520>

Is the law <WG3551> then <WG3767> against <WG2596> the promises <WG1860> of God? <WG2316> God <WG3361> <WG1096> forbid: <WG3361> <WG1096> for if <WG1487> there had been a law <WG3551> given <WG1325> which <WG3588> could <WG1410> have <WG2192> given <WG2227> life, <WG2227> truly <WG3689> righteousness <WG1343> should have been <WG2258> by the law. <WG3551>

But the scripture <WG1124> has concluded <WG4788> all <WG3956> under <WG5259> sin, <WG266> that the promise <WG1860> by faith <WG4102> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> might be given <WG1325> to them that believe. <WG4100>
But before <WG4253> faith <WG4102> came, <WG2064> we were kept <WG5432> under <WG5259> the law, <WG3551> shut <WG4788> up to the faith <WG4102> which should <WG3195> afterwards be revealed. <WG601>
Why <WG5620> the law <WG3551> was our schoolmaster <WG3807> to bring us to Christ, <WG5547> that we might be justified <WG1344> by faith. <WG4102>
But after that faith <WG4102> is come, <WG2064> we are no <WG3765> longer <WG2089> under <WG5259> a schoolmaster. <WG3807>
For you are all <WG3956> the children <WG5207> of God <WG2316> by faith <WG4102> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>
For as many <WG3745> of you as have been baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> have put <WG1746> on <WG1746> Christ. <WG5547>

There is neither <WG3756> Jew <WG2453> nor <WG3761> Greek, <WG1672> there is neither <WG3756> bond <WG1401> nor <WG3761> free, <WG1658> there is neither <WG3756> male <WG730> nor <WG3761> female: <WG2338> for you are all <WG3956> one <WG1520> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>
And if <WG1487> you be Christ's, <WG5547> then <WG686> are you Abraham's <WG11> seed, <WG4690> and heirs <WG2818> according <WG2596> to the promise. <WG1860>
